title: I am having issues with all sensors on Pixel 3, including auto-rotate, active edge & light sensor
content:
Autorotate, gyroscope, light sensor and squeeze are not working. All these options are enabled in the settings. I installed Sensor lab, and everything apart from network activity is flatlined.

I have tried everything described in the posts below, including:
- resetting Google app cache
- resetting app settings
- swapping sim card
- rebooting in safe mode
- last resort of a factory reset.

None of these make a difference. 
This has been happening for a few months now, and is quite frustrating always ot have to adjust brightness and not being able to take photos and videos in landscape. Once, after a reboot around a month ago, all sensors started working again, but on the next reboot everything stopped again, and I haven't managed to get them working again. 

These are the posts I checked, none of which provided a solution:
https://support.google.com/pixelphone/thread/3086868?hl=en
https://support.google.com/pixelphone/thread/3194922?hl=en
https://support.google.com/pixelphone/thread/1717632?hl=en

Device is less than 1 year old and under warranty.
